citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 am on August
20, 2024. A family member said that the licensee was not home. A call was made to the licensee and he said he was not
sure he could be back to the facility within an hour. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 am on August 
20, 2024. A family member said that the licensee was not home. A call was made to the licensee and he said he was not 
sure he could be back to the facility within an hour. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
